description: Articles on agricultural policies, farmer welfare, and rural development in India.

articles.title: Farming in Telangana: Major Issues in 2026
articles.excerpt: In 2026, Telanganaâ€™s farmers face a complex mix of technical and environmental hurdles. Significant urea shortages and distribution app glitches have delayed cultivation, while erratic weather has intensified pest pressure. Meanwhile, ongoing inter-state water disputes and a massive shift toward subsidized oil palm cultivation are reshaping the state's agricultural landscape.
articles.author: V S Yerraguid
